Package org.xflatdb.xflat.convert.converters

This package contains basic converters implemented for common conversion types.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateConverters
    Contains a number of converters to and from Date.
    JavaBeansPojoConverter
    This PojoConverter maps Java beans to XML using XMLEncoder.
    JAXBPojoConverter
    A PojoConverter that extends a ConversionService to convert all unknown objects to and from Element using JAXB.
    JDOMConverters
    A number of converters that converts JDOM values to and from several types.
    StringConverters
    Contains a number of converters to and from strings
    TwoStepConverter<From,Intermediate,To>
    A converter that converts one value to another by first converting to an intermediate value.
    XStreamPojoConverter
    A PojoConverter that uses XStream for marshalling and unmarshalling.

Package org.xflatdb.xflat.convert.converters Description

This package contains basic converters implemented for common conversion types. The converters in this package focus on converting to and from Element.
